answers.answer: The Health Promotion Center offers free medical consultations, access to various medical services like ultrasounds and ECGs, and psychological support. Consultations are provided by specialists such as pediatricians, cardiologists, and dentists.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Every refugee from Ukraine, regardless of age, can use the Health Promotion Center.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: One can receive medical care by making an appointment through a phone call. Appointments can be scheduled by calling 0747 278 486 or 0748 185 714.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The Health Promotion Center's working hours are Monday to Friday from 10:00 to 18:00.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The medical specialists available at the Center include pediatricians, cardiologists, diabetologists, ophthalmologists, and dentists.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The Health Promotion Center offers psychological support for refugees of any age. The content does not specify the method of provision beyond stating that it is offered.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The Health Promotion Center provides translation help in English, Russian, or Ukrainian languages to facilitate better communication with doctors.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Appointments for the Health Promotion Center can be made by calling 0747 278 486 or 0748 185 714. Calls can be made in Romanian, Russian, Ukrainian, or English.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Specific medical tests offered at the Health Promotion Center include ultrasounds (by doctor's recommendation), ECGs, blood pressure measurement, and blood glucose level checks.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The provided content does not specify the exact hours when people can call to make appointments. It only states the working hours of the Health Promotion Center.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The Health Promotion Center provides free medical care through Red Cross Romania, which opened the center with the support of the French Red Cross.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/health-promotion-center and read the page carefully.
